customer_addr:

ESCONDIDO, CA 92029

citations.narrative:
The wire, fenced gate between the two outdoor pens housing llamas, alpacas and goats was in disrepair. The upper part
of this gate had loose and broken, protruding wire points as well as a gap or opening approximately 2ft.X 3ft.in size. The
animals may become injured from sharp, protruding wires or could possibly become caught or trapped in any loose wiring
or open gaps in fencing. All housing facilities and animal areas must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair
to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals. A system of timely identification, facility repair and
maintenance must be in place.
Correct by 08/08/2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The wire, fenced gate between the two outdoor pens housing llamas, alpacas and goats was in disrepair. The upper part 
of this gate had loose and broken, protruding wire points as well as a gap or opening approximately 2ft.X 3ft.in size. The 
animals may become injured from sharp, protruding wires or could possibly become caught or trapped in any loose wiring 
or open gaps in fencing. All housing facilities and animal areas must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair 
to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals. A system of timely identification, facility repair and 
maintenance must be in place. 
 
Correct by 08/08/2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
